noun.description: The Norwegian language, especially in its medieval form.
Norwegians or Scandinavians, especially in medieval times.
examples: he spent a lifetime fighting against the Norse

adjective.description: Relating to medieval Norway or Scandinavia, or their inhabitants or language.
examples: Loki was the Norse god of evil
Keld is a Norse word meaning “a spring”

origin: From Dutch noor(d)sch, from noord north; compare with Swedish, Danish, and Norwegian Norsk.
